column3: and I was pretty certain you will not find a stout that you can see right through
column5: I drank it anyway. Â At the end of the meal I showed him on my phone that I was correct
column6: and at that point he apologized
column7: and then brought me a free sample of the beer I had actually ordered with the check. So
column8: that was a nice touch that saved him from a less than enthusiastic tip.
